title: I Love All Of You, Except Rasen, That One's Unbased

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose two people each night to work things out with each night. They are notified of this and may now win with you. Cannot target Rasen. If you are redirected to Rasen for any reason, your ability will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You lose if @rasen7721 is alive at the end of the game, no matter what their role is.
- At the start of the game, you cannot win with anyone. This excludes any players with roles that can be reasonably assumed to be the personification of a GIM player or player(s) except for ones that personify Rasen.
- You gain a permanent private chat with all players you may win with.
- Rasen does not have to be in the game for this to spawn. If they are, they can't roll this role.
- If you may can win with all players currently alive, the game will instantly end with all players that can win with you winning the game.  This attribute can trigger even if you're dead.
- You may not win if there are any players alive at the end of the game that you have not worked things out with.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Work things out with everyone alive at the end of the game.
